revised_title: Obituary of Hans Gadow and Arthur James Balfour
tldr: This article is an obituary for Hans Gadow, a renowned comparative anatomist, and Arthur James Balfour, a prominent British zoologist and politician. Gadow made significant contributions to the study of vertebrate morphology, while Balfour was a professor of animal morphology at Cambridge. Both individuals had a profound impact on the field of zoology, and their personal qualities and love for the subject are remembered fondly by their peers.
